languages.text: "Они носят имя "генокрады", и это — не просто мутанты. Это ксеночума, плодящаяся в телах людей, навек искажая их генетический код и делая рабами разума выводка. И эта угроза серьезнее, чем флотилия друкари, разоривших столицу ранее. Если они на Даргонусе, рано или поздно они попытаются забрать его".

"They are called Genestealers, and they are not simple mutants. They are a xenos plague that breeds inside the human brain, forever distorting their genetic makeup and enslaving them to the brood. This is much more threatening than the Drukhari fleet that ravaged the capital earlier. If they are on Dargonus, then they will try to overtake the entire planet sooner or later."
languages.original_text: "Они носят имя "генокрады", и это — не просто мутанты. Это ксеночума, плодящаяся в телах людей, навек искажая их генетический код и делая рабами разума выводка. И эта угроза серьезнее, чем флотилия друкари, разоривших столицу ранее. Если они на Даргонусе, рано или поздно они попытаются забрать его".

They are the xeno-plague that breeds inside the human brain, forever distorting their genetic makeup and enslaving them to the brood. And this is much more threatening than the Drukhari fleet that ravaged the capital earlier. If they are on Dargonus, then they will try to overtake it sooner or later."

languages.text: “他们被称为‘基因窃取者’。他们并不是简单的变种人，而是在人脑之中繁衍的异形瘟疫。这种瘟疫会彻底扭曲人类的基因结构，让他们沦为虫群的奴隶。基因窃取者比之前蹂躏首都的黑暗灵族舰队更具威胁。如果他们真的潜伏在达戈努斯，那他们迟早会打算侵占整颗行星。”
languages.original_text: "They are called Genestealers, and they are not simple mutants. They are a xenos plague that breeds inside the human brain, forever distorting their genetic makeup and enslaving them to the brood. This is much more threatening than the Drukhari fleet that ravaged the capital earlier. If they are on Dargonus, then they will try to overtake the entire planet sooner or later."

traits.locale_text: “他们被称为‘基因窃取者’。他们并不是简单的变种人，而是在人脑之中繁衍的异形瘟疫。这种瘟疫会彻底扭曲人类的基因结构，让他们沦为虫群的奴隶。基因窃取者比之前蹂躏首都的黑暗灵族舰队更具威胁。如果他们真的潜伏在达戈努斯，那他们迟早会打算侵占整颗行星。”

languages.text: «Se llaman Genestealers, y no son simples mutantes. Son una xenoplaga que se reproduce dentro del cerebro humano, distorsionando para siempre su composición genética y esclavizándolos a la prole. Esto es mucho más amenazador que la flota Drukhari que asoló la capital tiempo atrás. Si están en Dargonus, tarde o temprano intentarán apoderarse de todo el planeta».
languages.original_text: "They are called Genestealers, and they are not simple mutants. They are a xenos plague that breeds inside the human brain, forever distorting their genetic makeup and enslaving them to the brood. This is much more threatening than the Drukhari fleet that ravaged the capital earlier. If they are on Dargonus, then they will try to overtake the entire planet sooner or later."

traits.locale_text: «Se llaman Genestealers, y no son simples mutantes. Son una xenoplaga que se reproduce dentro del cerebro humano, distorsionando para siempre su composición genética y esclavizándolos a la prole. Esto es mucho más amenazador que la flota Drukhari que asoló la capital tiempo atrás. Si están en Dargonus, tarde o temprano intentarán apoderarse de todo el planeta».

languages.text: 「奴らはジーンスティーラーと呼ばれ、単なる変異体ではない。人間の脳の中で繁殖し、遺伝子構造を永遠に歪め、個体群の奴隷にするゼノの疫病なのだ。以前、首都を荒らしたデュカーリ艦隊よりもはるかに脅威となる存在だ。奴らがダルゴナスを狙っているのなら、遅かれ早かれ惑星全体を征服しようとするだろう」
languages.original_text: "They are called Genestealers, and they are not simple mutants. They are a xenos plague that breeds inside the human brain, forever distorting their genetic makeup and enslaving them to the brood. This is much more threatening than the Drukhari fleet that ravaged the capital earlier. If they are on Dargonus, then they will try to overtake the entire planet sooner or later."

traits.locale_text: 「奴らはジーンスティーラーと呼ばれ、単なる変異体ではない。人間の脳の中で繁殖し、遺伝子構造を永遠に歪め、個体群の奴隷にするゼノの疫病なのだ。以前、首都を荒らしたデュカーリ艦隊よりもはるかに脅威となる存在だ。奴らがダルゴナスを狙っているのなら、遅かれ早かれ惑星全体を征服しようとするだろう」

languages.text: « Ces Genestealers, comme on les surnomme, ne sont pas de simples mutants. Il s'agit d'un fléau xénos qui se loge dans le cerveau humain, déformant irrémédiablement son patrimoine génétique et réduisant son propriétaire en esclavage. Cette menace est nettement plus dangereuse que la flotte drukhari qui a ravagé la capitale... S'ils sont sur Dargonus, ils tenteront tôt ou tard de s'emparer de toute la planète. »
languages.original_text: "They are called Genestealers, and they are not simple mutants. They are a xenos plague that breeds inside the human brain, forever distorting their genetic makeup and enslaving them to the brood. This is much more threatening than the Drukhari fleet that ravaged the capital earlier. If they are on Dargonus, then they will try to overtake the entire planet sooner or later."

traits.locale_text: « Ces Genestealers, comme on les surnomme, ne sont pas de simples mutants. Il s'agit d'un fléau xénos qui se loge dans le cerveau humain, déformant irrémédiablement son patrimoine génétique et réduisant son propriétaire en esclavage. Cette menace est nettement plus dangereuse que la flotte drukhari qui a ravagé la capitale... S'ils sont sur Dargonus, ils tenteront tôt ou tard de s'emparer de toute la planète. »

languages.text: "Man nennt sie Symbionten, und sie sind keine bloßen Mutanten. Sie sind eine Xeno-Seuche, die sich im menschlichen Gehirn einnistet und den Gencode des Opfers für immer verändert, um es zum Sklaven ihrer Rotte zu machen. Das ist eine sehr viel größere Gefahr als die Drukhari-Flotte, die unsere Hauptwelt angegriffen hat. Wenn sie auf Dargonus sind, werden sie früher oder später versuchen, den gesamten Planeten zu übernehmen."
languages.original_text: "They are called Genestealers, and they are not simple mutants. They are a xenos plague that breeds inside the human brain, forever distorting their genetic makeup and enslaving them to the brood. This is much more threatening than the Drukhari fleet that ravaged the capital earlier. If they are on Dargonus, then they will try to overtake the entire planet sooner or later."

traits.locale_text: "Man nennt sie Symbionten, und sie sind keine bloßen Mutanten. Wenn sie auf Dargonus sind, werden sie früher oder später versuchen, den gesamten Planeten zu übernehmen."

languages.text: "Onlara Gençalan denir ve sıradan mutantlar değillerdir. İnsanların beyinleri içinde yumurtlayarak genetik yapılarını ebediyen bozan ve onları sürünün kölesi hâline getiren bir zeno vebasıdır. Gençalanlar, kısa süre önce başkenti yağmalayan Drukhari filosundan çok daha büyük bir tehdit teşkil ediyorlar. Dargonus'a geldilerse eninde sonunda tüm gezegeni ele geçirmeyi deneyeceklerdir."
languages.original_text: "They are called Genestealers, and they are not simple mutants. They are a xenos plague that breeds inside the human brain, forever distorting their genetic makeup and enslaving them to the brood. This is much more threatening than the Drukhari fleet that ravaged the capital earlier. If they are on Dargonus, then they will try to overtake the entire planet sooner or later."
